    • Method Detail

      • triggerComponent

        public static void triggerComponent(Context context,
                    int newState,
                    int flags,
                    java.lang.Class<?> receiver)
        Purpose - Trigger a receiver as defined in android:enabled property in the manifest file.
        Parameters:
        context - Current Activit\Context from which this method is called
        newState - Set the new state of the component. Check PackageManager.COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE_ENABLED and PackageManager.COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE_DISABLED
        flags - Optional behavior. Pass PackageManager.DONT_KILL_APP or 0.
        receiver - Class object of the desired component

      • setAlarm

        public static void setAlarm(Context context,
            int alarmType,
            int type,
            int triggerAtMillis,
            int interval,
            int requestCode,
            int flags,
            java.lang.Class<?> alarmReceiver)
        Purpose - Sets an alarm and triggers the receiver.
        Parameters:
        context - Current Activity\Context from which this method is called
        alarmType - One of INEXACT_REPEATING, EXACT, or REPEATING.
        type - One of ELAPSED_REALTIME, ELAPSED_REALTIME_WAKEUP, RTC, or RTC_WAKEUP.
        triggerAtMillis - time in milliseconds that the alarm should first go off, using the appropriate clock (depending on the alarm type).
        interval - interval in milliseconds between subsequent repeats of the alarm
        requestCode - Private request code for the sender
        flags - May be FLAG_ONE_SHOT, FLAG_NO_CREATE, FLAG_CANCEL_CURRENT, FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT, or any of the flags as supported by Intent.fillIn() to control which unspecified parts of the intent that can be supplied when the actual send happens.
        alarmReceiver - Class object of the receiver which will be triggered

      • cancelAlarm

        public void cancelAlarm(Context context,
               AlarmManager alarmMgr,
               PendingIntent alarmIntent)
        Purpose - Removes any alarm with the maching intent.
        Parameters:
        context - Current Activity\Context from which this method is called
        alarmMgr - One of INEXACT_REPEATING, EXACT, or REPEATING.
        alarmIntent - Intent to match for removal
